meaningMnemonic: You see an <radical>animal</radical> wearing a <radical>top hat</radical> and decide to <kanji>aim</kanji> at it. The top hat is a perfect, giant target you use to take down this animal.
readingMnemonic: Ready, steady, <kanji>aim</kanji>... fire! You throw a bar of <reading>so</reading>ap (そ) at the animal. Yes, soap. You were sitting in your bathtub, washing and scrubbing, then the animal in the top hat caught your eye.
